caption:
This photograph captures a lively street scene with various activities and subjects. At the center, a man with dark hair and a beard is straddling a small black-and-white pony. He wears a light pink polo shirt and dark pants. To the left, a young girl with blonde hair stands by herself, wearing purple pants and a dark top while clutching something with her hands. Further to the right of the image, there are three individuals engaged in interacting with the pony; particularly, a woman with dark, mid-length hair is feeding or petting the pony, and next to her, a young boy in blue jeans and a beige shirt looks on with a joyful expression.

In the background, a concrete building with some green foliage around it can be seen, along with several parked cars, including a prominent dark-colored car. The location looks like a parking lot adjacent to a lightly wooded area, possibly on the outskirts of a town or near a communal area. The scene conveys a casual, perhaps spontaneous gathering focused on the interaction with the pony, adding a sense of community and leisure to the setting. The brightness of the day and the shadows indicate it's a sunny day, contributing to the lively, outdoor atmosphere of the photograph.
title: A miner who had completed his work shift is shown on a pony belonging to the family of the tavern operator.  A short while later he was bucked off.  There is little for the young miners to do in the small mining towns other than drink beer and talk.  In Rhodell, West Virginia, near Beckley
